paper_abstract: We compute the temperature dependent magnetic susceptibility of the single-impurity, two-channel Anderson model with an alternative multistep numerical renormalization-group transformation, previously applied only to the two-impurity single-channel Kondo model. Compared with the traditional transformation, the new procedure requires substantially less memory and computational time, and opens therefore perspectives for the application of the numerical renormalization-group procedure to more complex Hamiltonians. paper_title: Multi-step transformation in numerical renormalization group
